name: Code:Stars Space Shooter
description:
Simple endless space shooter that I made to begin to learn C# and Unity.

Comments and bug reports are welcome.

Controls:

  • Move: WASD or arrows;
  • Shoot: left mouse button;
  • No break expected (btw there is a trick for this);
  • For quit or restart... die.

Credits:

  • Assets and sprites: Kenney
  • Background: OpenGameArt
  • Intro music:  OpenGameArt
  • Sounds: Kenney
